Commands.Burst: Magic BRV attack  Fills card stock (3)  MAX BRV increased based on card stock  Becomes Mega Burst with full card stock (powerful BRV attack)
Commands.Mega Burst: Potent BRV magic attack.  Removes cards from stock
Commands.Spiral Combo: Magic BRV attack + HP attack  Fills card stock (3)  MAX BRV increased based on card stock  Becomes Great Spiral Combo with full card stock (high-hit HP attack)
Commands.Mega Spiral Combo: 5-hit BRV magic attack + HP attack.  Self: 4 turns ATK Up I.  Removes cards from stock
Commands.Jackpot Shot: 6-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%  Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets  Fills card stock 3  MAX BRV increased based on card stock  Cancels previously granted Red/Black/Blue/Yellow Card  Self: 5 turns Red, Black, Blue, or Yellow Card

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.What Lies Beyond Boost: Increases the effects of What Lies Beyond by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Burst: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Burst by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Spiral Combo: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Spiral Combo by 10%

Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is at least 50% of Max BRV
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Spiral Combo Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Spiral Combo ,  Mega Spiral Combo ,  Mega Spiral Combo+
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Burst Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Burst ,  Mega Burst ,  Mega Burst+
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is at least 50% of Max BRV
Passives.What Lies Beyond: Slightly raises Attack when Card Stock is full
Passives.Speed Card Stock: Slightly raises SPD when card stock greater than 1
Passives.Burst Extension: When using Burst:  Slight damage boostWhen using Mega Burst:  Moderate damage boostUpon using Mega Burst:  Card stock remains 3
Passives.Ability Attack Bonus: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack, HP Attack
Passives.Spiral Combo Extension: When using Spiral Combo:  Large BRV damage boostWhen using Great Spiral Combo:  Tremendous BRV damage boost  ATK Up boost, duration+Upon using Great Spiral Combo:  Card stock remains 3

Weapons.Akademeia Deck CP: 35: When using  Spiral Combo ,  Mega Spiral Combo ,  Mega Spiral Combo+ :- Raises BRV potency- Lowers Action Delay
Weapons.Playing Cards CP: 15: When using  Burst ,  Mega Burst ,  Mega Burst+ :- Raises BRV potency- Grants  Small Max BRV Up  for 4 turns
